TopicTitle: Anyone up for some good old fashioned dogfighting?

Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentlemen, I give you....

The Space Duck

You will need:

C7 parts

NovaSilisko parts

Aerospike engine from Assorted Hardware
Most badass plane ever made. Well done sir

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2516.0;topicseen

can it do this?
omg it reminds me of the wright brothers.

Un-Kerbaling-believable! My hat is off to you good sir!

Now we just need a gun...

omg it reminds me of the wright brothers.

Sopwith Camel, I should say.
Ahaha, wow. You just made my day. That thing is downright epic. 8)
I want to see someone put it in orbit.
*cough* since you have alot of room under those wings, you would really add missliles of bombs to deploy! (even though it may not look right!)
Pretty sure that would do dire things to the balance, Tim.
I'd like to see that in a video. ;D

C7 parts

NovaSilisko parts

Aerospike engine from Assorted Hardware

I have all those but it still won\'t load. Are there anymore mods?

Hmm... this might require an older version of C7, before the new 'controlsurface' parts were added.

Edit: Yep, just checked, the first version of C7 with Controlsurface came out on Sept 13th (version 1.3) - which was 2 days after Sordid made this.

You\'ll need to download C7 version 1.2: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36240098/C7flightpackv1-2.zip

Remove the current version from KSP and install that one - it should load the plane. Then REMOVE the elevator flaps from the wings (looks like there are 6 of them, including the 2 on the tail-wings) and RESAVE the craft file.

Then you can get rid of the old version of C7, upgrade to the current one and the plane should load. Add back the elevator flaps and you\'re good to go.

The reason it won\'t load is because the flap parts were changed by Harvester in the update that came out around that day, so while they LOOK the same, the internal part-type is different. Since KSP doesn\'t include that old part-type anymore, its treated as a missing part.

Hmm... this might require an older version of C7, before the new 'controlsurface' parts were added.

Sordid do you think you can fix this?

*bump* It would be very cool sordid if you did what C7 said and put that as the craft file so we don\'t have to so it could be more convienient, also im not good at putting things exactly where they used to be

Oh my, I never realized my little biplane was popular enough that its demise would be noticed at all.

Fine, I\'ll fix it. Just not right now.

I gotta go.

Stuff to do, y\'know.

Skyrim
Oh you. Skyrim isn\'t an excuse.

Not terribly. Processor\'s fine, graphics card is slightly underpowered. But it\'s a three year old laptop, what else can you ask for.

i can run skyrim to maxium ;P beat that(Hot wheels referce)
